UK tickets on sale to 'The New Commonwealth'

Jonathan Lintner, jlintner@courier-journal.com 10:49 a.m. EST December 15, 2014

2015 Kentucky football season ticket seating chart and costs.(Photo: Courtesy TheNewCWS.com)

2 CONNECT 10 TWEETLINKEDIN 2 COMMENTEMAILMORE

Season tickets to "The New Commonwealth Stadium" went on sale Monday morning, the University of Kentucky has announced.

Fans who didn't have UK football season tickets in 2014 can purchase for 2015, when the renovated stadium opens, at TheNewCWS.com. The website features virtual, 360 degree views from every section, allowing fans to compare sight lines and amenities in Commonwealth's refreshed look.

Tickets, which cost $320 plus a donation depending on seating areas, can also be ordered over the phone by calling (800) 928-2287 or in person at UK's ticket office inside the Joe Craft Center. Hours are 9 a.m.-4 p.m. Monday-Friday.

RECRUITING: OL Drake Jackson commits to Wildcats

MORE UK FOOTBALL: Stoops lands two Nebraska transfers

The $120 million in renovations to Commonwealth Stadium are targeted to finish before UK's 2015 season opener against Louisiana-Lafayette. The new setup will feature improved concourses, concession areas and restrooms, as well as add premium seating options.

Renewal deadline for 2014 season ticket holders is April 22.
